pizzaProgram.gui.EventHandlers
Class OrderGUI_OrderViewEventHandler

java.lang.Object
  pizzaProgram.gui.EventHandlers.ComponentEventHandler
      pizzaProgram.gui.EventHandlers.OrderGUI_OrderViewEventHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
ActionListener, EventListener
public class OrderGUI_OrderViewEventHandler
extends ComponentEventHandler
implements ActionListener

Handles all events generated by user interaction with the order GUI

Author:
IT1901 Group 3, Fall 2011
